content.eamr: ( ing-2 "2 tablespoons grated fresh ginger root" )

content.text: 1 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into thin strips
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into thin strips" )

content.text: 0) In a large saucepan over medium heat, heat peanut oil.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "heat"@41:45 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "peanut oil"@46:56 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@28:39 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir in garlic, ginger, lemon grass, red pepper, coriander and cumin and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "garlic"@11:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "ginger"@19:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "lemon grass"@27:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "red pepper"@40:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "coriander"@52:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "cumin"@66:71 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "cook"@76:80 / AC
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until fragrant"@81:95 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "2 minutes"@97:106 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stir in chicken and onion and cook, stirring, until chicken is white and onion is translucent, 5 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "chicken"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "onion"@23:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "cook, stirring"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until chicken is white and onion is translucent"@49:96 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "5 minutes"@98:107 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Stir in bok choy and cook until it begins to wilt, 5 to 10 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "bok choy"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "cook"@24:28 / AC
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until it begins to wilt"@29:52 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "5 to 10 minutes"@54:69 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Stir in water, coconut milk, fish sauce and cilantro.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "water"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "coconut milk"@18:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "fish sauce"@32:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "cilantro"@47:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Simmer until chicken is thoroughly cooked and flavors are well blended, 30 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Simmer"@3:9 / AC
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until chicken is thoroughly cooked and flavors are well blended"@10:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "30 minutes"@75:85 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
